message: I understand you want a larger share, but the value decreases for me each round. This offer is fair considering the time pressure.
Considering the inflation, this is a more balanced offer.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer gives me a slight edge considering the inflation, and it's our best chance to settle before the value drops further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the larger share.
Alice, this back and forth is getting us nowhere.  I'm firm on this amount. Take it or leave it – we're running out of time.
I'm not budging much, the pressure is on you due to inflation.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  We're both losing out because of the inflation.  I'm offering a perfectly even split.  Take it or leave it – I won't go any lower.
